course.name: Kubernetes & Helm Course
course.description: Kubernetes from the ground up, following the "Hard Way" philosophy: understand every component before using abstractions. Covers core K8s, networking, security, Helm chart development, and production patterns.
course.status: In progress â€” all modules written, exercises pending

modules.title: Quick Reference
modules.description: kubectl cheat sheet, resource kinds, common labels/annotations, YAML gotchas, and API version reference.

modules.title: Containers & Local Setup
modules.description: What containers are, Docker basics, setting up a local cluster with Docker Desktop / minikube / kind, and kubectl.

modules.title: Cluster Architecture
modules.description: Control plane vs data plane, API server, etcd, scheduler, controller manager, kubelet, kube-proxy, and the reconciliation loop.

modules.title: The API Server & kubectl
modules.description: RESTful resource model, API groups and versions, kubectl verbs, output formats, dry-run, and kubectl explain.

modules.title: Pods
modules.description: Pod spec, multi-container patterns (sidecar, init, ambassador), resource requests and limits, QoS classes, and pod lifecycle.

modules.title: Workload Controllers
modules.description: ReplicaSets, Deployments, rolling updates, DaemonSets, StatefulSets, Jobs, and CronJobs.

modules.title: Services & Networking
modules.description: Pod networking model, Service types (ClusterIP, NodePort, LoadBalancer, ExternalName), kube-proxy modes, and endpoints.

modules.title: Ingress & Gateway API
modules.description: Ingress resources, ingress controllers, TLS termination, Gateway API, and path-based and host-based routing.

modules.title: DNS & Service Discovery
modules.description: CoreDNS, service DNS records, headless Services, and ExternalDNS.

modules.title: ConfigMaps & Secrets
modules.description: ConfigMaps from literals and files, Secret types, env vars vs volume mounts, and immutable ConfigMaps.

modules.title: Persistent Storage
modules.description: Volumes, PersistentVolumes, PersistentVolumeClaims, StorageClasses, dynamic provisioning, and access modes.

modules.title: RBAC & Security
modules.description: ServiceAccounts, Roles, ClusterRoles, RoleBindings, Pod Security Standards, SecurityContext, and NetworkPolicies.

modules.title: Namespaces & Resource Management
modules.description: Namespace isolation, ResourceQuotas, LimitRanges, namespace strategies, labels, and selectors.

modules.title: Observability & Probes
modules.description: Liveness, readiness, and startup probes, metrics-server, Prometheus basics, logging conventions, and kubectl debug.

modules.title: Troubleshooting
modules.description: Debugging CrashLoopBackOff, ImagePullBackOff, Pending pods, OOMKilled, events, logs, and systematic debugging methodology.

modules.title: Helm Fundamentals
modules.description: What Helm solves, charts, releases, repositories, helm install/upgrade/rollback, and values overrides.

modules.title: Chart Development
modules.description: Chart structure, Chart.yaml, values.yaml, templates, built-in objects, Go template basics, and helm create.

modules.title: Advanced Helm Templates
modules.description: Named templates, _helpers.tpl, include vs template, tpl, toYaml/nindent, conditionals, loops, hooks, subcharts, and dependencies.

modules.title: Helm in Production
modules.description: Chart testing and linting, OCI registries, Helmfile, GitOps with ArgoCD and Flux, chart versioning, and signing.

modules.title: Deployment Strategies
modules.description: Blue-green, canary with Argo Rollouts, progressive delivery, PodDisruptionBudgets, and rollback strategies.

modules.title: Autoscaling
modules.description: HPA with CPU, memory, and custom metrics, VPA, Cluster Autoscaler, and KEDA for event-driven scaling.

modules.title: Cluster Management
modules.description: kubeadm, managed K8s (EKS, GKE, AKS), version upgrades, etcd backup/restore, node maintenance, and cluster federation.

projects.title: Deploy nginx with Probes
projects.description: Deploy nginx to your local cluster with resource limits, liveness/readiness probes, and multiple replicas. Your first real deployment.

projects.title: Expose a Guestbook App
projects.description: Deploy a Redis-backed guestbook with frontend and backend Services, DNS-based discovery, and Ingress routing.

projects.title: Stateful App with Persistence
projects.description: Deploy PostgreSQL with a StatefulSet, PVC for persistent data, ConfigMap for config, and Secrets for credentials.

projects.title: Deploy a Microservices App
projects.description: Write raw K8s manifests for a 3-service app (frontend, API, Postgres): Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, Secrets, Ingress. No Helm.

projects.title: Secure & Harden a Cluster
projects.description: Given a cluster with security gaps, write manifests to lock it down: RBAC, NetworkPolicies, Pod Security Standards, proper Secrets.

projects.title: Build a Helm Chart
projects.description: Package a multi-service app as a Helm chart with proper values.yaml, conditionals, helpers, tests, and environment overrides.

projects.title: Monitoring Stack
projects.description: Deploy Prometheus and Grafana using Helm charts, set up ServiceMonitors, and create a dashboard for your app's metrics.

projects.title: Production Deployment Pipeline
projects.description: Full GitOps pipeline: Helm chart + ArgoCD Application + HPA + PDB + canary rollouts + automated rollback. Capstone.
